summary:
- **Issue Type**: Proposed issue of unquoted options (employee incentive)  
- **Total Options**:  
  - 1,880,000 options exercisable at $0.20, expiring 30 June 2028  
  - 1,880,000 options exercisable at $0.20, expiring 30 June 2029  
- **Purpose**: Employee/director remuneration under Employee Securities Incentive Plan (alignment with shareholders)  
- **Key Date**: Proposed issue date 20/11/2025 (subject to shareholder approval on 19/11/2025)  
- **Material Terms**: [Link to plan terms](https://www.falconmetals.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2024/01/Annexure-A-2023.11-Employee-Securities-Incentive-Plan-Falcon-Metals-Ltd.pdf)  
- **Key Conditions**: Shareholder approval required (no underwriting or lead manager involved).  

**Note**: No immediate capital raised; potential dilution if options exercised (3.76M new shares).
